name: The temple of Hurama
description:
Rence finally found Smoke amulet and the key to the great temple of Hurama. Now he must face the final test to get the favor of the elemental guardians. Master the 4 elements (like long ago, according to legend, had done Agtaske), To pass this test, he must to travel to the great temple, beat the beasts that inhabit it, solve puzzles leading to the lair of each elemental stone and prove he has the strength to deserve the power to control the elements.

Programming by Giovanny Beltrán: https://github.com/agar3s

Art by Mateo Robayo: http://cepillosdedientes.tumblr.com/

Music by Mauricio Robayo: https://soundcloud.com/oromasgo
